import React, { useState } from 'react' import '../styles/PopForm.css' import userFrame from '../icons/frame.png' import clockIcon from '../icons/clock.png' import closeIcon from '../icons/close.png' import DropMenu from './DropMenu' export default function PopForm(){ const [role,setRole]=useState() const [dropmenu,setshow]=useState(false) function selectRole(){ setRole() setshow(!dropmenu) } function roleDrop(){ setshow(!dropmenu) } return(

  • ios Developer
  • Android Developer
  • Full Stack Developer

  • Back-end Developer
}

) }
